description: Suga is a rapper, songwriter and music producer. He studied in Taejeon Elementary School, Gwaneum Middle School, and Apgujeong High School.

Rm is the leader of the group and he is also the oldest member in their group. He is a song writer and music producer. His Rapping skill is amazing that’s why he formerly called as rap monster by his fans.
Jin loves to play games, take selfies and cook.
J-Hope likes to listen to music during his free time.
Jimin was born in Busan, South Korea. He graduated with a bachelor of film and theatre at Busan High School of Arts and Global Cyber University.
V stands for Victory. He was born in Daegu. He made his acting debut with a supporting role or character in “KBS2‘s historical drama Hwarang: The Poet Warrior Youth”  with  his real name in 2017.

role: Main Vocalist, Lead Dancer. Sub Rapper, Center, Maknae
description: jungkook is known for his good vocals. Also, he holds a black taekwando belt. He wanted to be a badminton player when was still young.
